changelog.release_notes: This was inspired by blockslide-seconds watchface, but it always bothered me that the numbers would not reach the border of the screen, leaving some black screen space that does not match the same black from pebble piano-black border. I tried to mask this black diference.

data.description: Inspired by BlockSlide-Seconds watchface. It always bothered me that the digits did not reach the border of the screen, leaving a black space that was not the same shade of black as the pebble`s piano black border. I tried to mask this shade of black diference in my design.

latest_release.release_notes: This was inspired by blockslide-seconds watchface, but it always bothered me that the numbers would not reach the border of the screen, leaving some black screen space that does not match the same black from pebble piano-black border. I tried to mask this black diference.

data.title: Retro Burned  Squares
